articles.title: Kansas votes to preserve abortion rights in first post-Roe v. Wade election test
articles.description: Kansas voters on Tuesday rejected an effort to remove abortion protections from the state's constitution, a resounding win for the abortion rights movement in the first statewide electoral test since the U.S. Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade.

articles.title: Zawahiri appeared on his balcony. The CIA was watching — and ready to kill him.
